sentences.en: A posse of Marsh's friends persuaded them that this was a bad idea.
sentences.cn: 马什的一群朋友劝他们说这是个馊主意。

sentences.en: Chen Zhankui battle song gallops sky, we are posse fire.
sentences.cn: 军工战歌陈占奎驰骋天空, 我们是一团火.

sentences.en: Joy in living can never be assumed as a posse or put on as a mask.
sentences.cn: 生活的乐趣是无法靠姿态摆出来的,也无法用戴上一张面具来伪装.

sentences.en: Laugh at posse every time, 3 lunar hind laugh a few days again, really happy.
sentences.cn: 每次都笑成一团, 三个月后又大笑几天, 真是快乐.

sentences.en: Only the wise posse ideas ; the greater part of mankind is possessed by them.
sentences.cn: 惟有智者有创见,而大部分的人则被这些创见迷住了.

sentences.en: Street lamp light crouchs posse , resemble brushy balloon, wave in the sky in grey indigo color.
sentences.cn: 路灯光蜷缩一团, 象毛茸茸的气球, 飘在灰靛色的空中.

sentences.en: The posse are pursuing the thief.
The posse rode down the escaping bank robber.
sentences.cn: 一队警察驾车追上了正在逃跑的银行抢动犯.

sentences.en: The sheriff said posse could head off the outlaws at the pass.
sentences.cn: 那位行政司法长官说,警察们可以在关口截住那些亡命之徒.

sentences.en: The sheriff said that the posse could head off the outlaws at the pass.
sentences.cn: 那位行政司法长官说,警察们可以在关口截住那些''.'亡命之徒'.''.

sentences.en: Those on today's posse got one drink coming from the county budget!
sentences.cn: 今天巡逻的人喝一杯县里出钱的酒.

words.tran_cn: 一队；民防团；地方武装团队

phrases.tran_cn: [拉丁语]可能存在的(地)；可能的(地)；潜在的(地)

trans.tran_cn: 地方武装团队，一队，民防团
trans.tran_en: a group of the same kind of people
